message.content:
cs.NE, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.SI 

The paper proposes a method for improving the training of multi-layer perceptrons using auxiliary stochastic neurons. This topic is closely related to neural networks and machine learning, which are covered by several arXiv CS sub-categories. Specifically, cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) is the most likely category as it directly relates to the proposed method. cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) are also likely categories as they cover topics related to the training and optimization of neural networks. cs.CV (Computer Vision) is a possible category as the proposed method may have applications in image processing and analysis. Finally, cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) is a less likely category, but it is still possible as the paper discusses the use of semantic hashing, which is a technique used in information retrieval and recommendation systems.
